## AST.crossoverSingle() method

Immutably transplants a randomly chosen subtree of `parent2` into a randomly chosen location in `parent1` and vice versa. Returns 2 new trees.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
crossoverSingle(parent1: ASTNode<OP, T>, parent2: ASTNode<OP, T>): ASTNode<OP, T>[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  parent1 | <code>ASTNode&lt;OP, T&gt;</code> |  |
|  parent2 | <code>ASTNode&lt;OP, T&gt;</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`ASTNode<OP, T>[]`
